meanings.definition: A type of pants made of denim fabric.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite jeans to the party.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy new jeans for school.
meanings.sent3: The jeans decided to take a walk in the park.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was as sturdy as a pair of well-worn jeans.
meanings.sent5: The blue jeans stood out among the crowd of dresses.

meanings.sent1: He folded his jeans neatly in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: She washed her jeans with care to keep them looking new.
meanings.sent3: The jeans giggled when they saw themselves in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as tough as a pair of rugged jeans.
meanings.sent5: The jeans hugged her legs snugly, providing comfort all day long.
